title.en: Biographies of Lu Zhonglian and Zou Yang
title.raw: 《魯仲連鄒陽列傳》 Biographies of Lu Zhonglian and Zou Yang

sentences.zh: 魯仲連者，齊人也。

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian was Qi person.

sentences.zh: 好奇偉俶儻之畫策，而不肯仕宦任職，好持高節。

translations.literal: Loved grand extraordinary outstanding strategies, yet not willing serve in office hold position, liked maintain high integrity.

sentences.zh: 游於趙。

translations.literal: Traveled in Zhao.

Ru Zhonglian was a man of Qi. He delighted in strange, extraordinary, and unconventional strategies, but refused to take office or hold position, preferring to maintain lofty principles. He traveled in Zhao.

sentences.zh: 趙孝成王時，而秦王使白起破趙長平之軍前後四十餘萬，秦兵遂東圍邯鄲。

translations.literal: Zhao Xiao Cheng Wang time, yet Qin king sent Bai Qi broke Zhao Changping army before and after forty plus ten thousand, Qin troops thus east surrounded Handan.

sentences.zh: 趙王恐，諸侯之救兵莫敢擊秦軍。

translations.literal: Zhao king feared, feudal lords rescue troops none dared attack Qin army.

sentences.zh: 魏安釐王使將軍晉鄙救趙，畏秦，止於蕩陰不進。

translations.literal: Wei An Li Wang sent general Jin Bi save Zhao, feared Qin, stopped at Dangyin not advance.

sentences.zh: 魏王使客將軍新垣衍閒入邯鄲，因平原君謂趙王曰：「秦所為急圍趙者，前與齊湣王爭彊為帝，已而復歸帝；

translations.literal: Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuanyan secretly enter Handan, through Lord Pingyuan told Zhao king said: 'Qin what urgently besieges Zhao, previously with Qi Min Wang contended strength became emperor, soon after again returned emperor;

sentences.zh: 今齊［湣王］已益弱，方今唯秦雄天下，此非必貪邯鄲，其意欲復求為帝。

translations.literal: Now Qi Min Wang already increasingly weak, present time only Qin heroic world, this not necessarily greedy Handan, its intent wishes again seek become emperor.

sentences.zh: 趙誠發使尊秦昭王為帝，秦必喜，罷兵去。」

translations.literal: Zhao sincerely sends envoy honors Qin Zhao Wang as emperor, Qin certainly happy, stops troops leaves.'

sentences.zh: 平原君猶預未有所決。

translations.literal: Lord Pingyuan still hesitant not yet had decision.

During Zhao King Xiaocheng's time, Qin king sent Bai Qi to break Zhao's Changping army, forty plus ten thousand before and after, Qin troops then east besieged Handan. Zhao king feared, feudal lords' rescue troops none dared attack Qin army. Wei King Anli sent general Xin Bi rescue Zhao, feared Qin, stopped at Dangyin not advancing. Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuanjian enter Handan secretly, through Lord Pingyuan told Zhao king: 'Qin does this urgently besieging Zhao, previously with Qi Min Wang contended for supremacy to become emperor, afterward again returned emperor title; Now Qi Min Wang already increasingly weak, presently only Qin heroic in world, this not necessarily greedy Handan, its intent wishes again seek to become emperor. Zhao truly sends envoy honor Qin Zhao Wang as emperor, Qin must pleased, withdraw troops depart.' Lord Pingyuan hesitated not yet decided.

sentences.zh: 此時魯仲連適游趙，會秦圍趙，聞魏將欲令趙尊秦為帝，乃見平原君曰：「事將柰何？」

translations.literal: This time Lu Zhonglian just happened traveled Zhao, met Qin besieges Zhao, heard Wei will want make Zhao honor Qin as emperor, then saw Lord Pingyuan said: 'Affair will how?'

sentences.zh: 平原君曰：「勝也何敢言事！

translations.literal: Lord Pingyuan said: 'I dare not speak about affairs!

sentences.zh: 前亡四十萬之眾於外，今又內圍邯鄲而不能去。

translations.literal: Previously lost four hundred thousand multitude outside, now again internally besieges Handan yet cannot leave.

sentences.zh: 魏王使客將軍新垣衍令趙帝秦，今其人在是。

translations.literal: Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuanyan make Zhao emperor Qin, now that person is here.

sentences.zh: 勝也何敢言事！」

translations.literal: I dare not speak about affairs!'

sentences.zh: 魯仲連曰：「吾始以君為天下之賢公子也，吾乃今然後知君非天下之賢公子也。

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian said: 'I began considering you world's worthy noble son, I only now then know you not world's worthy noble son.

sentences.zh: 梁客新垣衍安在？

translations.literal: Wei guest Xin Yuanyan where is?

sentences.zh: 吾請為君責而歸之。」

translations.literal: I request for you blame and send him away.'

sentences.zh: 平原君曰：「勝請為紹介而見之於先生。」

translations.literal: Lord Pingyuan said: 'I request to introduce and present him to the master.'

sentences.zh: 平原君遂見新垣衍曰：「東國有魯仲連先生者，今其人在此，勝請為紹介，交之於將軍。」

translations.literal: Lord Pingyuan then saw Xin Yuanyan said: 'Eastern state has Lu Zhonglian master, now that person here, I request introduce, make him acquainted with general.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「吾聞魯仲連先生，齊國之高士也。

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'I heard Lu Zhonglian master, Qi state's noble scholar.

sentences.zh: 衍人臣也，使事有職，吾不願見魯仲連先生。」

translations.literal: Yan subject person, mission affairs have duty, I not wish see Lu Zhonglian master.'

sentences.zh: 平原君曰：「勝既已泄之矣。」

translations.literal: Lord Pingyuan said: 'I have already revealed it.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍許諾。

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan agreed.

At this time Ru Zhonglian just traveled Zhao, met Qin besieging Zhao, heard Wei will want make Zhao honor Qin as emperor, then saw Lord Pingyuan said: 'Affair will handle how?' Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng how dare speak affairs! Before lost forty thousand multitudes outside, now again inner besieging Handan cannot depart. Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuanjian make Zhao emperor Qin, now that person is here. Sheng how dare speak affairs!' Ru Zhonglian said: 'I began considering lord world worthy noble son, now then I know lord not world worthy noble son. Wei guest Xin Yuanjian where? I request for lord blame and return him.' Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng request introduce see mister.' Lord Pingyuan then saw Xin Yuanjian said: 'East state has Ru Zhonglian mister, now that person here, Sheng request introduce, make him befriend general.' Xin Yuanjian said: 'I heard Ru Zhonglian mister, Qi state's lofty scholar. Yuanjian subject minister, mission has duty, I not wish see Ru Zhonglian mister.' Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng already revealed it.' Xin Yuanjian permitted promised.

sentences.zh: 魯連見新垣衍而無言。

translations.literal: Lu Lian saw Xin Yuanyan yet without words.

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「吾視居此圍城之中者，皆有求於平原君者也；

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'I see those dwelling in this besieged city middle, all have requests from Lord Pingyuan;

sentences.zh: 今吾觀先生之玉貌，非有求於平原君者也，曷為久居此圍城之中而不去？」

translations.literal: Now I observe master's jade appearance, not have request from Lord Pingyuan, why long dwell this besieged city middle not leave?'

sentences.zh: 魯仲連曰：「世以鮑焦為無從頌而死者，皆非也。

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian said: 'World considers Bao Jiao as without followers eulogy died, all wrong.

sentences.zh: 眾人不知，則為一身。

translations.literal: Crowd not know, then for one person.

sentences.zh: 彼秦者，棄禮義而上首功之國也，權使其士，虜使其民。

translations.literal: That Qin, abandons rites righteousness and elevates head merit country, schemes makes its scholars, enslaves its people.

sentences.zh: 彼即肆然而為帝，過而為政於天下，則連有蹈東海而死耳，吾不忍為之民也。

translations.literal: If they recklessly become emperor, moreover govern world, then Lian has step East Sea die only, I not bear be their people.

sentences.zh: 所為見將軍者，欲以助趙也。」

translations.literal: What for see general, wish with help Zhao.'

Ru Zhonglian saw Xin Yuanjian without words. Xin Yuanjian said: 'I see dwell this besieged city middle, all have requests of Lord Pingyuan; Now I observe mister jade appearance, not one with requests of Lord Pingyuan. Why stay long this besieged city middle without depart?' Ru Zhonglian said: 'World considers Bao Jiao no followers eulogy died, all not so. Crowd people not know, then for one body. That Qin, abandons ritual righteousness above merit country, authority makes its scholars, captive makes its people. If immediately arrogantly becomes emperor, passes to govern world, then Zhonglian has step East Sea die, I not bear be its people. What for see general, wishes assist Zhao.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「先生助之將柰何？」

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Master help it how?'

sentences.zh: 魯連曰：「吾將使梁及燕助之，齊、楚則固助之矣。」

translations.literal: Lu Lian said: 'I will make Wei and Yan help it, Qi, Chu then firmly help it.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「燕則吾請以從矣；

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Yan then I request follow;

sentences.zh: 若乃梁者，則吾乃梁人也，先生惡能使梁助之？」

translations.literal: As for Wei, then I am Wei person, master how can make Wei help it?'

sentences.zh: 魯連曰：「梁未睹秦稱帝之害故耳。

translations.literal: Lu Lian said: 'Wei not seen Qin call emperor harm reason only.

sentences.zh: 使梁睹秦稱帝之害，則必助趙矣。」

translations.literal: Make Wei see Qin call emperor harm, then certainly help Zhao.'

Xin Yuanjian said: 'Mister assist how?' Ru Zhonglian said: 'I will make Wei and Yan assist it, Qi, Chu then certainly assist.' Xin Yuanjian said: 'Yan then I request follow; If Wei, then I am Wei person, mister how can make Wei assist?' Ru Zhonglian said: 'Wei not yet seen Qin called emperor harm therefore. Make Wei see Qin called emperor harm, then must assist Zhao.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「秦稱帝之害何如？」

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Qin call emperor harm how?'

sentences.zh: 魯連曰：「昔者齊威王嘗為仁義矣，率天下諸侯而朝周。

translations.literal: Lu Lian said: 'Formerly Qi Wei Wang once practiced benevolence righteousness, led world feudal lords pay homage Zhou.

sentences.zh: 周貧且微，諸侯莫朝，而齊獨朝之。

translations.literal: Zhou poor and weak, feudal lords none pay homage, yet Qi alone pay homage it.

sentences.zh: 居歲餘，周烈王崩，齊後往，周怒，赴於齊曰：『天崩地坼，天子下席。

translations.literal: Stayed year plus, Zhou Lie Wang died, Qi late go, Zhou angry, announced to Qi said: 'Heaven collapse earth split, Son of Heaven descend mat.

sentences.zh: 東藩之臣因齊後至，則斮。』

translations.literal: Eastern vassal minister because Qi late arrive, then decapitate.'

sentences.zh: 齊威王勃然怒曰：『叱嗟，而母婢也！』

translations.literal: Qi Wei Wang suddenly angry said: 'Scold, your mother female slave!'

sentences.zh: 卒為天下笑。

translations.literal: Finally became world laugh.

sentences.zh: 故生則朝周，死則叱之，誠不忍其求也。

translations.literal: Therefore alive then pay homage Zhou, dead then rebuke it, truly not bear its requests.

sentences.zh: 彼天子固然，其無足怪。」

translations.literal: That Son of Heaven as such, it not worth strange.'

Xin Yuanjian said: 'Qin called emperor harm how?' Ru Zhonglian said: 'Formerly Qi Wei Wang once did benevolence righteousness, led world feudal lords court Zhou. Zhou poor and small, feudal lords none court, Qi alone court it. Dwell year plus, Zhou Lie Wang collapsed, Qi later went, Zhou angered, announced Qi: 'Heaven collapse earth split, emperor descends mat. East fief ministers because Qi late arrive, then behead.' Qi Wei Wang suddenly angered said: 'Scold, your mother concubine!' Finally became world laugh. Thus alive then court Zhou, dead then scold it, truly not bear its demands. That emperor certainly so, its nothing strange.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「先生獨不見夫仆乎？

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Master alone not see that servant?

sentences.zh: 十人而從一人者，寧力不勝而智不若邪？

translations.literal: Ten people yet follow one person, rather strength not win yet wisdom not match?

sentences.zh: 畏之也。」

translations.literal: Fear him.'

sentences.zh: 魯仲連曰：「嗚呼！

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian said: 'Alas!

sentences.zh: 梁之比於秦若仆邪？」

translations.literal: Wei compared to Qin like servant?'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍曰：「然。」

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan said: 'Yes.'

sentences.zh: 魯仲連曰：「吾將使秦王烹醢梁王。」

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian said: 'I will make Qin king boil mince Wei king.'

sentences.zh: 新垣衍怏然不悅，曰：「噫嘻，亦太甚矣先生之言也！

translations.literal: Xin Yuanyan discontentedly displeased, said: 'Alas, also too excessive master words!

sentences.zh: 先生又惡能使秦王烹醢梁王？」

translations.literal: Master moreover how can make Qin king boil mince Wei king?'

sentences.zh: 魯仲魯曰：「固也，吾將言之。

translations.literal: Lu Zhonglian said: 'Certainly, I will speak of it.

sentences.zh: 昔者九侯、鄂侯、文王，紂之三公也。

translations.literal: Formerly Jiu Hou, E Hou, Wen Wang, Zhou three ducal ministers.

sentences.zh: 九侯有子而好，獻之於紂，紂以為惡，醢九侯。

translations.literal: Jiu Hou had daughter beautiful, offered to Zhou, Zhou considered ugly, made mincemeat Jiu Hou.

sentences.zh: 鄂侯爭之彊，辯之疾，故脯鄂侯。

translations.literal: E Hou argued strongly, debated fiercely, therefore dried meat E Hou.

sentences.zh: 文王聞之，喟然而嘆，故拘之牖里之庫百日，欲令之死。

translations.literal: Wen Wang heard this, sighed deeply, therefore imprisoned him Youli prison hundred days, wished make him die.

sentences.zh: 曷為與人俱稱王，卒就脯醢之地？

translations.literal: Why with people together call king, finally go to dried meat mincemeat place?

sentences.zh: 齊湣王之魯，夷維子為執策而從，謂魯人曰：『子將何以待吾君？』

translations.literal: Qi Min Wang to Lu, Yi Wei Zi as held whip followed, told Lu people said: 'You will how treat my lord?'

sentences.zh: 魯人曰：『吾將以十太牢待子之君。』

translations.literal: Lu people said: 'I will with ten great sacrificial animals treat your lord.'

sentences.zh: 夷維子曰：『子安取禮而來［待］吾君？

translations.literal: Yi Wei Zi said: 'You why take rites come treat my lord?

sentences.zh: 彼吾君者，天子也。

translations.literal: That my lord, Son of Heaven.

sentences.zh: 天子巡狩，諸侯辟舍，納筦籥，攝衽抱機，視膳於堂下，天子已食，乃退而聽朝也。』

translations.literal: Son of Heaven tours inspect, feudal lords clear residence, submit keys tallies, hold up hem embrace shuttle, view meals at hall below, Son of Heaven finished eating, then retreat listen court.'

sentences.zh: 魯人投其籥，不果納。

translations.literal: Lu people threw their tallies, not finally submit.

sentences.zh: 不得入於魯，將之薛，假途於鄒。

translations.literal: Could not enter Lu, led to Xue, borrowed road from Zou.

sentences.zh: 當是時，鄒君死，湣王欲入弔，夷維子謂鄒之孤曰：『天子弔，主人必將倍殯棺，設北面於南方，然後天子南面弔也。』

translations.literal: At this time, Zou lord died, Min Wang wished enter condole, Yi Wei Zi told Zou orphan said: 'Son of Heaven condoles, host certainly will double funeral bier, set north face at south, then Son of Heaven south face condole.'

sentences.zh: 鄒之群臣曰：『必若此，吾將伏劍而死。』

translations.literal: Zou ministers said: 'If necessarily like this, we will prostrate sword die.'

sentences.zh: 固不敢入於鄒。

translations.literal: Firmly dared not enter Zou.

sentences.zh: 鄒、魯之臣，生則不得事養，死則不得賻襚，然且欲行天子之禮於鄒、魯，鄒、魯之臣不果納。

translations.literal: Zou, Lu ministers, alive then not able serve support, dead then not able contribute shrouds, yet moreover wished perform Son of Heaven rites at Zou, Lu, Zou, Lu ministers not finally submit.

sentences.zh: 今秦萬乘之國也，梁亦萬乘之國也。

translations.literal: Now Qin ten thousand chariots country, Wei also ten thousand chariots country.

sentences.zh: 俱據萬乘之國，各有稱王之名，睹其一戰而勝，欲從而帝之，是使三晉之大臣不如鄒、魯之仆妾也。

translations.literal: Both occupy ten thousand chariots countries, each have call king name, see its one battle win, wish follow make emperor it, this makes Three Jin ministers not as good as Zou, Lu servants concubines.

sentences.zh: 且秦無已而帝，則且變易諸侯之大臣。

translations.literal: Moreover Qin endlessly emperor, then moreover change replace feudal lords ministers.

sentences.zh: 彼將奪其所不肖而與其所賢，奪其所憎而與其所愛。

translations.literal: They will take away their unworthy give to their worthy, take away their hated give to their loved.

sentences.zh: 彼又將使其子女讒妾為諸侯妃姬。

translations.literal: They moreover will make their children slanderous concubines become feudal lords wives concubines.

sentences.zh: 處梁之宮。

translations.literal: Dwell Wei palaces.

sentences.zh: 梁王安得晏然而已乎？

translations.literal: Wei king how can peacefully stop?

sentences.zh: 而將軍又何以得故寵乎？」

translations.literal: And general moreover how obtain former favor?'

Xin Yuanjian said: 'Mister alone not see those servants? Ten people from one person, rather strength not win intelligence not equal? Fear it.' Ru Zhonglian said: 'Alas! Wei compared to Qin like servant?' Xin Yuanjian said: 'Yes.' Ru Zhonglian said: 'I will make Qin king boil pickle Wei king.' Xin Yuanjian discontented said: 'Hey, too excessive mister's words! Mister again how can make Qin king boil pickle Wei king?' Ru Zhonglian said: 'Certainly, I will speak it. Formerly Jiu Hou, E Hou, Wen Wang, Zhou's three dukes. Jiu Hou had daughter beautiful, offered to Zhou, Zhou considered ugly, pickled Jiu Hou. E Hou disputed strong, argued quick, thus dried E Hou. Wen Wang heard, sighed deeply, thus imprisoned in Youli library hundred days, wished make him die. Why with people together called king, finally go to pickle dry place?' Qi Min Wang to Lu, Yi Wei Zi as held whip followed, told Lu people: 'You will what treat my lord?' Lu people said: 'We will with ten great feasts treat your lord.' Yi Wei Zi said: 'You where get ritual come treat my lord? That my lord, emperor. Emperor tours inspect, feudal lords avoid shed, hand over key flute, gather robe embrace knee, view meals at hall below, emperor already eaten, then retreat listen court.' Lu people threw their flute, not actually hand over. Could not enter Lu, will go Xue, borrow road Zou. At this time, Zou lord died, Min Wang wished enter mourn, Yi Wei Zi told Zou's orphan: 'Emperor mourns, host must double funeral coffin, set north face at south, then emperor south face mourns.' Zou's ministers said: 'Must like this, we will fall sword die.' Firmly not dare enter Zou. Zou, Lu ministers, alive then not able serve nourish, dead then not able send funeral gifts, yet wish execute emperor ritual at Zou, Lu, Zou, Lu ministers not actually accept. Now Qin ten thousand chariot country, Wei also ten thousand chariot country. Both occupy ten thousand chariot countries, each have called king name, see its one battle win, wish follow emperor it, this makes three Jin ministers not equal Zou, Lu servants concubines. Moreover Qin not stop emperor, then will change feudal lords ministers. They will seize their unworthy give their worthy, seize their hated give their loved. They again will make their children slanderous concubines become feudal lords consorts. Dwell Wei palace. Wei king how get peaceful already? General again how get former favor?'

sentences.zh: 於是新垣衍起，再拜謝曰：「始以先生為庸人，吾乃今日知先生為天下之士也。

translations.literal: Thereupon Xin Yuanyan rose, bowed twice apologized said: 'Initially considered master ordinary man, I only today know master is world gentleman.

sentences.zh: 吾請出，不敢復言帝秦。」

translations.literal: I request leave, dare not again speak emperor Qin.'

sentences.zh: 秦將聞之，為卻軍五十里。

translations.literal: Qin general heard this, caused withdraw army fifty li.

sentences.zh: 適會魏公子無忌奪晉鄙軍以救趙，擊秦軍，秦軍遂引而去。

translations.literal: Just met Wei prince Wuji seize Jin Bi army to save Zhao, strike Qin army, Qin army then led away.

Thus Xin Yuanjian rose, twice bowed thanked: 'Began considering mister common person, now then today know mister world scholar. I request leave, not dare again speak emperor Qin.' Qin generals heard, retreated army fifty li. Just met Wei prince Wuqi seize Xin Bi army to rescue Zhao, attacked Qin army, Qin army then withdrew departed.

sentences.zh: 於是平原君欲封魯連，魯連辭讓（使）者三，終不肯受。

translations.literal: Thereupon Pingyuan Jun wished enfeoff Lu Lian, Lu Lian declined messengers three times, finally unwilling accept.

sentences.zh: 平原君乃置酒，酒酣起前，以千金為魯連壽。

translations.literal: Pingyuan Jun then set up wine, wine happy rose advanced, with thousand gold for Lu Lian toast.

sentences.zh: 魯連笑曰：「所貴於天下之士者，為人排患釋難解紛亂而無取也。

translations.literal: Lu Lian laughed said: 'What valued in world gentlemen, for people dispel troubles release difficulties resolve disputes without taking.

sentences.zh: 即有取者，是商賈之事也，而連不忍為也。」

translations.literal: If have taking, is merchant matters, and Lian not bear do.'

sentences.zh: 遂辭平原君而去，終身不復見。

translations.literal: Then took leave Pingyuan Jun departed, lifetime not again see.

Thus Lord Pingyuan wished enfeoff Ru Zhonglian, Ru Zhonglian declined messengers three times, finally not willing accept. Lord Pingyuan then set wine, wine flowing rose front, with thousand jin for Ru Zhonglian longevity. Ru Zhonglian laughed: 'What valued in world scholars, for people dispel calamity release difficulties resolve disputes without take. If have take, is merchant affairs, Zhonglian not bear do.' Thus declined Lord Pingyuan departed, lifetime not again see.

sentences.zh: 其後二十餘年，燕將攻下聊城，聊城人或讒之燕，燕將懼誅，因保守聊城，不敢歸。

translations.literal: After this twenty plus years, Yan general attacked took Liaocheng, Liaocheng people some slandered him to Yan, Yan general feared execution, therefore defended Liaocheng, dared not return.

sentences.zh: 齊田單攻聊城歲餘，士卒多死而聊城不下。

translations.literal: Qi Tian Dan attacked Liaocheng year plus, soldiers many died yet Liaocheng not fall.

sentences.zh: 魯連乃為書，約之矢以射城中，遺燕將。

translations.literal: Lu Lian then made letter, bound to arrow shot into city, sent Yan general.

sentences.zh: 《書》曰：

translations.literal: Letter said:
